GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object with the corresponding article_id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments associated with the article_id

comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id.description: posts a comments and responds with an object of the posted comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increases the votes on the given article by the given amount and returns the updated article object

updatedArticle.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
updatedArticle.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
